name: UpdateDashboardTemplate
description:
Partially update a dashboard template in Datadog.

Use this tool to apply partial updates to a specific dashboard template in Datadog. This is useful for modifying specific attributes of an existing dashboard template without updating it entirely.

parameters.name: dashboard_template_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the dashboard template to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dashboard template.

parameters.name: dashboard_project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to access a specific dashboard. Obtain it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dashboard_update_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object with fields like 'id', 'template_name', 'dashboard_description', 'tiles', etc., to partially update the dashboard template.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dashboard template.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dashboard template.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
